mapper.select: with T01 as ( select C.username, C.name, C.subsection_name, C.section_name from ( select A.*, B.subsection_name, B.section_name from users A left join ( select A.id, A.name subsection_name, B.name section_name from subsection A left join section B on A.section_id = B.id ) B on A.subsection_id = B.id ) C ), T02 as ( select T.id, t.device_name, t.record_type, t.it_user_code, it_user.name AS it_user_name, t.pic_code, pic_user.name AS pic_name, t.date, pic_user.section_name, t.remark from is_device_transaction T join T01 it_user ON T.it_user_code = it_user.username join T01 pic_user ON t.pic_code = pic_user.username ) select A.*, T02.record_type, T02.it_user_code, T02.it_user_name, T02.pic_code, T02.pic_name, T02.date, T02.section_name, T02.remark, CASE WHEN record_type = 'IN' THEN 'Nhận lại' WHEN record_type = 'OUT' THEN 'Bàn giao' END AS record_type_name from is_device A left join T02 on A.transaction_id = T02.id
SELECT A.username, concat(A.username, ' - ', A.name) code_name FROM users A where status = 1

with T01 as ( select C.username, C.name, C.subsection_name, C.section_name from ( select A.*, B.subsection_name, B.section_name from users A left join ( select A.id, A.name subsection_name, B.name section_name from subsection A left join section B on A.section_id = B.id ) B on A.subsection_id = B.id ) C ), T02 as ( select T.id, t.device_name, t.record_type, t.it_user_code, it_user.name AS it_user_name, t.pic_code, pic_user.name AS pic_name, t.date, pic_user.section_name, T.remark from is_device_transaction T join T01 it_user ON T.it_user_code = it_user.username join T01 pic_user ON t.pic_code = pic_user.username ) select T02.*, A.model, A.type, CASE WHEN record_type = 'IN' THEN 'Nhận lại' WHEN record_type = 'OUT' THEN 'Bàn giao' END AS record_type_name from T02 left join is_device A on T02.device_name = A.name order by T02.id desc
